TITLE: Federal prosecutors charge Bankman-Fried with massive, yearslong fraud
SUMMARY: Prosecutors allege that Sam Bankman-Fried oversaw a massive corporate fraud at FTX and its affiliates that cost customers and investors billions of dollars in losses.

TITLE: U.S. inflation slowed sharply to 7.1 percent over past 12 months
SUMMARY: Even with last month’s further easing of inflation, the Federal Reserve plans to keep raising interest rates.

TITLE: Why the 2024 Race Is Eerily Quiet
SUMMARY: The 2024 presidential campaigns of both Donald Trump and Joe Biden are riddled with uncertainties. That means other presidential hopefuls are lying low — for now.

TITLE: ‘America has achieved a tremendous scientific breakthrough’
SUMMARY: Fusion energy has long been a dream for scientists who say the technology will enable cheap, plentiful power that does not produce the planet-heating gases or pollution that come with burning fossil fuels.

TITLE: How the House GOP could remove Dems from committees — and who isn't on board
SUMMARY: GOP leadership has vowed to remove three Democrats from panels next year.

TITLE: Opinion | What the Debate Over Guns Tells Us About America
SUMMARY: On the anniversary of Sandy Hook, it’s worth contemplating the disconnect between what most Americans want, and what the political system delivers.

TITLE: Advocacy groups warn of harassment on Twitter after Musk kills safety board
SUMMARY: Elon Musk continues to unravel existing content moderation policies with the disbanding of its outside council.

TITLE: New Jersey overhauled its bail system under Christie. Now some Democrats want to roll it back.
SUMMARY: The new push in Trenton represents a stunning reversal for the social justice movement.

TITLE: Indiana's crowded GOP race for governor heats up
SUMMARY: The open-seat primary has big implications for Washington, with Sen. Mike Braun jumping in and setting off another open battle for his perch.

TITLE: What to know about DOE’s fusion milestone
SUMMARY: Experiments at a U.S. government lab may have provided "proof that the physics work." But future fusion reactors might turn to a different technology for replicating the energy that powers the sun.

TITLE: McConnell raises pressure as government funding talks churn on
SUMMARY: The Senate minority leader is threatening to punt spending levels into March unless Congress can pass a deal by Dec. 22.

TITLE: Biden still feels ‘a moral obligation’ to Sandy Hook, 10 years later
SUMMARY: The inability to curb gun violence for Sandy Hook families still weighs heavily on Biden.

TITLE: Jeffries dodges on Dem support for moderate GOP 'unity' speaker
SUMMARY: "Let's see what happens on Jan. 3," the New York Democrat said.

TITLE: GOP operative who allegedly kicked a dog hired as top aide to new congressman
SUMMARY: Brandon Phillips was arrested last month on a charge of animal cruelty. In 2016, he resigned as Donald Trump's Georgia state director after his criminal history was revealed.

TITLE: Democrats elected a big class of young governors. They might be the future of the party.
SUMMARY: These new state executives say they're "the next generation of national leaders," and they're willing to wait their turn — for now.

TITLE: Biden signs historic bill codifying same-sex and interracial marriage
SUMMARY: With his signature, the president burnished his legacy on marriage equality.

TITLE: U.S. touts fusion breakthrough as one of ‘most impressive scientific feats’ this century
SUMMARY: It will still take at least “a few decades" to turn the laboratory breakthrough into a viable source of energy for people and businesses, one Energy Department official said.

TITLE: New York's Black leaders to convene on crime following midterm losses for Democrats
SUMMARY: Rev. Al Sharpton is organizing the summit that’s planned for January.

TITLE: Breaking down the Jan. 6 committee’s possible referrals — criminal and beyond
SUMMARY: Panel members have stressed the “symbolic” impact of the recommendations.

TITLE: DeSantis calls for grand jury to investigate Covid-19 vaccines
SUMMARY: Gov. Ron DeSantis’ announcement was the latest in an ongoing war between his administration and the Biden administration — and the broader medical community — over the pandemic.

TITLE: Attorneys demand GOP take down sexualized images of former Washington Commanders employees
SUMMARY: Lisa Banks and Debra Katz said the release of the images in a House Republican memorandum left their clients “humiliated and incensed.”

TITLE: Democracy for America on track to shut down
SUMMARY: The organization started in its current form after Howard Dean’s unsuccessful 2004 presidential campaign, and throughout its history it helped elect more than 1,000 progressive candidates.

TITLE: U.S. close to decision on sending Patriot missiles to Ukraine
SUMMARY: The surface-to-air systems are at the top of Kyiv's wish list.

TITLE: Top appropriators clinch deal on government funding framework
SUMMARY: Leading negotiators didn’t release government funding totals in announcing the deal, but appropriators have largely settled on an $858 billion defense budget in recent weeks.
